title: CoinEx Will List SOMI (Somnia) on Sep 2, 2025
content: Dear CoinEx users, To provide you with more trading options, after rigorous reviews, CoinEx will list SOMI (Somnia) on Sep 2, 2025. The details are as follows: List Time1. Deposit: 14:30 on Sep 2 (UTC)2. Withdrawal: 14:30 on Sep 2 (UTC)3. Trading pair: SOMI/USDT4. Opening method: Call Auction    a. Call Auction        14:30-14:35 Sep 2  (UTC)        Orders can be placed and canceled        14:35-14:40 Sep 2  (UTC)        Orders can be placed but cannot be canceled    b. Trading        14:40 Sep 2 (UTC)5. Service support: SOMI/USDT supports AMM, Spot Grid, and Auto-Invest Plan. SOMI (Somnia): https://explorer.somnia.network/ About SOMISomnia is a high-performance, cost-efficient EVM-compatible Layer 1 blockchain capable of processing over 1,000,000 transactions per second with sub-second finality. It supports millions of users and real-time mass-consumer applications like games, social apps, and metaverses, all fully on-chain. Developed with breakthrough technology including Multistream Consensus, ICEdb, and advanced compression, Somnia achieves unmatched speed and scalability. Supported by Improbable and MSquared with strong funding, it enables easy developer transitions with full EVM compatibility and a vision to transform digital experiences via blockchain.Learn more about SOMI>> About Automated Market Making (AMM)AMM is supported for the SOMI/USDT market. CoinEx AMM allows every user to become a market maker. By adding liquidity to the liquidity pool, users can share 50% of the trading fees earned in this market. The fee dividends are calculated daily. Learn about AMM >> About Spot GridSpot Grid is supported for the SOMI/USDT market. Spot Grid is a trading strategy suitable for volatile markets. It helps you capture profits in market fluctuations by automatically executing buy low and sell high within a certain market range 24 hours a day. Learn about Spot Grid >> About Auto-Invest PlanAuto-Invest Plan is supported for the SOMI/USDT market. CoinEx Auto-Invest Plan is a trading strategy that helps you automatically accumulate crypto assets via pre-set investment and recurring cycles. It has the advantages of automatic execution, convenience, and friendly entry. With a minimum of 1 USDT, you can make stable investments and realize wealth growth. Learn about Auto-Invest Plan >> Risk ReminderCrypto products are innovative investment products with large price fluctuations as well as high investment risks. Therefore, please evaluate and invest wisely based on your risk tolerance and financial resources. CoinEx reserves the final interpretation of this announcement. CoinEx TeamSep 2, 2025  · Invite friends to register and share up to 40% trading fee rebate.
